This Grafana instance centralizes logs, metrics, and tracing data from all microservices.

### Dashboards:
- **[Loki - Centralized Logs](http://localhost:3000/d/loki-centralized-logs)**: Logs from all microservices, filter by service, log level, etc.
- **[JVM Monitoring](http://localhost:3000/d/jvm-monitoring)**: Micrometer metrics for Spring/Java microservices (heap, GC, threads, CPU, memory).
- **[Kafka Monitoring](http://localhost:3000/d/kafka-monitoring)**: Kafka topics, consumers, producer metrics, lag, throughput.
- **[SAGA Orchestrator](http://localhost:3000/d/saga-orchestrator)**: Track SAGA state transitions, successful requests, compensations, and errors.

### External tools:
- **[Prometheus](http://localhost:9090/)**: Raw metrics collection and queries for all services.
- **[Jaeger](http://localhost:16686/)**: Distributed tracing for microservice transactions and SAGA spans.

Use this dashboard as the starting point to navigate the observability ecosystem for this project.
